title: The only problem with Jhin
body:
1. His eye is on the left side of his face, both in his model and Mind of the Virtuoso video, but in his splash art it is also on his left side, even though he is looking into a mirror, which means if he wasn't looking into a mirror his eye would be on the right side of his face and thus be wrong.

2. the right side of his mask has 3 ridges underneath his eye, both in his model and the Mind of the Virtuoso, these ridges are on the side without his eye, yet in his splash art they are on the same side. 

3. In his model he is wearing a glove with only 1 finger covered, in Mind of the Virtuoso, he is wearing a glove with all fingers covered, and in his splash art he is wearing a fingerless glove, covering all fingers halfway.

4. in his model and splash art the 3 ridges on his mask are on the same side as his shoulder bulge, yet in his 'about the creation of jhin' artwork they are on opposite sides (and while its hard to tell, it looks like they are on opposite sides in mind of the virtuoso as well)

5. In his splash art, Mind of the Virtuoso, and champion select picture, his eye is Red, but in his in game profile pic, killstreak pic and his in game model, his eye is clearly blue, and is a completely different shape.

-

I would avoid using mirrors ever again riot, you just end up confusing yourself, and no one wants that.

'Fired' is a strong word.. but i would consider having Jhin's consistency manager... uhhh... 're-assessed'...

replies.body: and his in game model has like a greenish blue eye
TL;DR: Riot isn't good with mirrors.

I do have one other problem.

And its a gameplay one, there is a distinct delay between visual updates with ult and without ult, also ability animations dont seem to play during ult.

As an example i have missed far too many shot because i lead the shot perfectly but suddenly that trist has teleported outside of the ult range because her rocket jump animation didnt play and the visuals didnt update until she was already outside of ult range.

This is with 30ms too so we can rule out ping being the issue.

I cant say I've had this problem, but i have been hit by 4 jhin bullets where there was no animation at all. It showed the boundaries of the ult and then my health just started disappearing and i was slowed. no animation.
